pages.text: Proburnetia is a biarmosuchian that lived in the Late Permian. Its fossils have been found in Russia and it grew up to 1.5m in length. It was interpreted to be a carnivore and its skull had strange protrusions and bumps.
$(l)Eats:$() Meat$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Meat$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Nested Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Find Egg in Nest
